subject: docs(claude-md): add commit message format guidelines
body:
Add structured commit message format section to CLAUDE.md under
HARD RULES. Defines required metadata footers for all commits
including Tags, Complexity, Urgency, Impact, Risk, Debt, Epic,
and Semver fields with allowed values documented.

Tags: documentation, developer-experience, conventions
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: commit-guidelines
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01DL8TTDUhcTXTyunMjgCwkR
title: add commit message format guidelines
